segments.text: did you go to university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , I graduated with a BA in English from Qingdao University .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: when did you graduate ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: just a few years ago . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just graduated from high school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: are you planning on going to university ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to get a BA , but I don't know where I should go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: have you applied anywhere yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , I've applied to four universities and have been accepted into all of them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: congratulations ! Which one is the cheapest ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: the tuition is the same for all of them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: which one has the most interesting course ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think the course at Leeds University is interesting , but I think the one at Manchester University would be more practical .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: where would you like to be located ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd really like to be in London , but it's the most expensive city in England to live in , so I don't know if I can afford to live there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: have you applied for grants or financial aid of some sort ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: not yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you should do that soon . It will help you make a decision about the school you go to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's a good idea .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: good luck !
segments.speaker: S2
